shopifyCollection.title: Patches
shopifyCollection.description: Embroidered and chenille patches. Your jean jackets and backpacks will thank you.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Embroidered and chenille patches. Your jean jackets and backpacks will thank you.

products.title: I'm Not Tired Embroidered Patch
products.description: If only this was true for adults too. Either way, your kid will love it. This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. Size: 3.5" Color: Orange
products.descriptionHtml:
If only this was true for adults too. Either way, your kid will love it. 

This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

Size: 3.5" 

Color: Orange

products.description: What's more Buffalo than a pennant? Well, lot's of things, but we're trying to make pennants a thing. You get it. Get your Buffalo Pennant Chenille Patch for a two for one deal - show your Buffalo AND Oxford Pennant pride. Size: 4.5" x 2.5" Color: Blue, gold, and black
